divs: Sighting Detailsi have been seeing ufos on a regular basis with the blue light in my room and high strangeness. actually i was hearing knocks on my roof while writing this .and the night i got the picture of the entity i was hearing knocks at my backdooor during a meditation and prayer to cleanse my chakras and my home of negative energy and entities . and i stuck my digital camera out th e window took a pic expecting to catch a peeping tom. and also about a week earlier th e same shape was casting a shadow on my bedroom wall from outside my bedroom window .my eyes opened from a sleep and i saw the shadow moving back and forth without making noise in th e leaves out back my girlfriend saw it and tried to wake me but i was already watching it .it seemed to be hovering when it moved cuz it didnt strut moving back and forth in a strange way .when i finally got the courage to look out the window it must of known cuz it left before i even got a chance.i have had many ufo sightings and just last night i got a feeling to look at the sky and saw another star like ufo but ive seen triangles red and orange on m0re than one ocasion and with witnessed sightings of large white orbs one over my neighbors and it moved away when i saw it so fast it almost looked like it disapeared and another time i got a feeling to look at th e space station and saw two orbs go under it one after another and disapear .
